thread.title: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for graft
thread.title_full: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for graft

title: Perak Immigration director, three others arrested for graft
text:
More 
The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) today arrested the Perak Immigration Department director and three others for corruption. 
In a statement, MACC said the suspects were arrested between midnight and 5.30am today, in various locations around Perak. 
Apart from the 57-year-old director, the three other suspects are two businessmen, aged 30, and a 26-year-old mechanic.
